entry.title: BLIZZARD WARNING , Goderich
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:40 AM EST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: -8.1°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Goderich 09:00 AM EST Saturday 24 December 2022
Temperature: -8.1°C
Pressure / Tendency: 99.6 kPa rising
Humidity: 82 %
Wind Chill: -19
Dewpoint: -10.6°C
Wind: WSW 52 km/h gust 74 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Saturday: Blizzard. High minus 5.
entry.summary: Blizzard. Local snowfall amount 10 to 15 cm. Wind southwest 60 km/h gusting to 90. High minus 5. Wind chill minus 21 this morning and minus 16 this afternoon. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday night: Blizzard. Temperature steady near minus 7.
entry.summary: Blizzard ending overnight then a few flurries. Risk of snow squalls overnight. Blowing snow overnight. Local snowfall amount 10 to 15 cm. Wind west 60 km/h gusting to 80. Temperature steady near minus 7. Wind chill near minus 18. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday: A few flurries. High minus 4.
entry.summary: Flurries with risk of snow squalls. Local blowing snow. Local amount 10 to 15 cm. Wind west 50 km/h gusting to 70. High minus 4. Wind chill minus 18 in the morning and minus 12 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 14. POP 70%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 70 percent chance of flurries. Low minus 14. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Saturday 24 December 2022
